attributes.action: Time for Michael Gove to resign
attributes.additional_details:
It is time for the Secretary of State for Education to resign.
Michael Gove's  decision to replace Baroness Sally Morgan as Head of school inspectorate Ofsted after previously declaring that she was doing a fantastic job was justified on the need for "fresh eyes" in this vital area of Education.
In his own words, Secretary of State Michael Gove has stated that there is a "need to refresh" heads of public bodies.
It is now time for him to leave his post so that his office be reinvigorated by  someone less aggressive and more willing to listen to others..
